genbank:Reference.genbank:title: Hippocampal inputs engage CCK+ interneurons to mediate endocannabinoid-modulated feed-forward inhibition in the prefrontal cortex.
genbank:Reference.genbank:authors: Liu X, Dimidschstein J, Fishell G, Carter AG

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: AAV vector for Cre-dependent transgene expression of ChR2-mCherry in cortical interneurons under the control of the Dlx enhancer..

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GGATACTT). lox2272 sites are compatible with each other, but incompatible with loxP or loxN sites (Lee and Saito, 1988).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lox2272
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lox2272

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: F1 origin, forward primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: F1ori-F
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: F1ori-F

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Factor Xa site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: Factor Xa recognition and cleavage site

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Synthetic intron, forward primer

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GGATACTT). lox2272 sites are compatible with each other, but incompatible with loxP or loxN sites (Lee and Saito, 1988).
